materials: Authentic airplane parts, MDF, cinematic blood, image transfer medium
description:
- walk into the room and grieve for how bad aviation is for the environment
- but also aviation is sick
- the monolithic figures watch each other in silence. Yet hollow
- kill everybody in sight
- there is no hiding
- have you ever been to the RAF museum?
